casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Robert Lee Golden No. 509P13-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2016. Robert Golden, for Golden, Robert Lee. Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 1st of June 2016 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, New Hanover County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of June 2016."
